comments: RAR shows Adebayo (MIA) jumps vertically and absorbs the contact from DeRozan (SAS) to his chest during the driving shot attempt.
[Observable in enhanced video] DeRozan (SAS) slides his pivot foot at the start of his dribble.

call_type: Turnover:  Out of Bounds - Bad Pass Turn
comments: DeRozan (SAS) last touches the ball before it goes out of bounds.
Adebayo (MIA) establishes himself in a wide screening position in Gay's (SAS) path, but contact on the pick occurs to Gay's upper body.
Gay (SAS) maintains his right hand against Adebayo's (MIA) left hip after the pick takes place and as they move into the lane, but contact is marginal and does not affect Adebayo's SQBR.
Aldridge (SAS) legally contests Wade's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
[Observable in enhanced video] RAR shows Wade (MIA) moves his pivot foot heel-to-toe to create distance.
MOB shows Jones Jr. (MIA) makes contact with DeRozan's (SAS) right arm as he attempts to pass, but it is marginal and does not affect his ability to do so.
Aldridge (SAS) slightly extends his forearm against Jones Jr.'s (MIA) front during the inbound to disengage.
Richardson (MIA) makes marginal contact with Gay's (SAS) side after his gather.

[Observable in enhanced video] DeRozan (SAS) lifts and re-plants his pivot foot to the floor after picking up his dribble in the lane.  The officials are looking for any possible illegal contact and do not pick up the pivot foot.
Richardson (MIA) maintains legal guarding position and makes incidental contact with DeRozan (SAS) that does not affect his drive to the basket.
Adebayo (MIA) makes marginal contact with DeRozan's (SAS) left shoulder after he picks up his dribble and it does not affect his ability to maintain control of the ball.
Waiters (MIA) makes incidental "high-five" contact with Gay (SAS) after the release of his jump shot attempt.

Wade (MIA) makes marginal contact with the side of Mills' (SAS) face as he goes for the rebound. Contact to an opponent's head/face can be deemed marginal when the result of a natural basketball move, provided the contact is not disproportionate or uncontrolled.
Video evidence is inconclusive if Mills (SAS) makes contact with the ball while he is out of bounds.
Adebayo (MIA) establishes himself in a screening position in DeRozan's (SAS) path and does not deliver the contact.
DeRozan (SAS) cleanly blocks Richardson's (MIA) jump shot attempt before incidental lower body contact is made.
RAR shows Wade (MIA) cleanly deflects the ball away from DeRozan (TOR).
Belinelli (SAS) commits the take foul on Richardson (MIA).
Aldridge (SAS) commits the take foul on Olynyk (MIA).
[Observable in enhanced video] Forbes (SAS) slides his pivot foot prior to the start of his upward shooting motion.
Jones Jr. (MIA) makes incidental "high-five" contact with Forbes (SAS) after the release of his jump shot attempt.
